abstract: Coca-Cola, the world’s biggest drinks maker, is seeking more acquisition opportunities in the fast-growing soft drinks market to expand its revenue sources, the company’s presumptive next chief executive said on Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: Coca-Cola, the world’s biggest drinks maker, is seeking more acquisition opportunities in the fast-growing soft drinks market to expand its revenue sources, the company’s presumptive next chief executive said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Coca-Cola Seeks Small Deals to Augment Growth
